ruleFindUrl:
<js>
www="https://www.shuhaige.com/top.html";
css=".newnav a[href~=^(?!http|\/all)],.top>li:not(:nth-child(2))>a";
pn="{searchPage.html}&&";
importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);
function wy(x,y){
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(x)).select(y).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+"::"+a.attr("href")+pn).join("");return list};
result=wy(www,css)
</js>
